The photo was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been shared more than 24,000 times.
The post: s Urdu-language caption translates to English as a plea for attention to the issue of the Peshawar Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) system, indicating that the photo is recent.
Saleem Safi: a prominent journalist, has been tweeting about the state of the Peshawar BRT system, further validating the claim.
The photo was originally published by Da: a major Pakistani English-language newspaper, in May 2018, reporting an accident in Multan, which is unrelated to the Peshawar BRT system.
